ads.name: Helsing
ads.fullMessage:
Helsing is a defence AI company with a mission to protect our democracies.

We believe we have a responsibility to be thoughtful about the development and deployment of powerful technologies.

We are proud of the world-class team we have built from diverse backgrounds, combining deep experience in defence, artificial intelligence and software engineering.

Join our European teams.

Apply your Rust skills to solve complex, high-stakes problems that matter most.

ads.name: AWS
ads.message: Build with Rust on AWS Lambda
